      • getAllVideos

        public static java.lang.String getAllVideos(java.lang.String ch_name)
        To retrieve the list of all videos for a channel in the database
        Parameters:
        ch_name - the name of the channel
        Returns:
        the query string to use to retrieve the list of videos

      • getPath

        public static java.lang.String getPath(java.lang.String url)
        To retrieve a path of a single video in the vid_path table
        Parameters:
        url - the url of the video
        Returns:
        the query string to use to retrieve the path of the corresponding video

      • insertChannelVids

        public static java.lang.String insertChannelVids(java.lang.String ch_name,
                                                 java.lang.String url)
        To insert a (channel_name, url)-tuple into the channel_vids table of the DB
        Parameters:
        ch_name - the name of the channel
        url - the url of the corresponding video
        Returns:
        the query string to use to insert the tuple in the channel_vids table

      • updateChannelVids

        public static java.lang.String updateChannelVids(java.lang.String ch_name,
                                                 java.lang.String url)
        To update the channel_vids table with a new video url. Since vids is a set, duplicate values will not be stored distinctly.
        Parameters:
        ch_name - the name of the channel
        url - the url of the corresponding video
        Returns:
        the query string to use to update the channel_vids table

      • insertUrlPath

        public static java.lang.String insertUrlPath(java.lang.String url,
                                             java.lang.String path)
        To insert a new video to the vid_path table. NOTE: duplicate values will be overwritten because the IF NOT EXIST parameters return errors (to fix)
        Parameters:
        url - the url of the video
        path - the path where the video is stored
        Returns:
        the query string to use to insert the new video into the vid_path table.

      • insertIPCache

        public static java.lang.String insertIPCache(java.lang.String ip,
                                             int port)
        To insert a new ip-port record in the database ip_cache table. For the deletion see @see #deleteIPCache(String, int)
        Parameters:
        ip - the ip of the cache server
        port - the port of the cache server
        Returns:
        the query string to use to insert the record in the table.

      • deleteIPCache

        public static java.lang.String deleteIPCache(java.lang.String ip,
                                             int port)
        To delete a ip-port record in the database ip_cache table. For the insertion see @see #insertIPCache(String, int)
        Parameters:
        ip - the ip of the cache server
        port - the port of the cache server
        Returns:
        the query string to use to delete the record in the table.

      • selectFromIPCache

        public static java.lang.String selectFromIPCache()
        To select all the record inside the ip_cache table
        Returns:
        the query string to select all the record inside the ip_cache table.

      • selectFromIPCache

        public static java.lang.String selectFromIPCache(java.lang.String ip,
                                                 int port)
        To select a specific record inside the ip_cache table given the ip and the port
        Parameters:
        ip - the ip of the cache server
        port - the port of the cache server
        Returns:
        the query string to use to select a specific record in the table.

      • checkQuery

        public static CheckerDB checkQuery(java.lang.String request)
        To check the syntax of the query received and identify the service a.k.a method, requested
        Parameters:
        request - the string to be checked
        Returns:
        an object of type Checker with informations about the correctness of the request
